# includeHiddenAssets

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the fetch result includes assets marked as hidden.

## Declaration

```swift
var includeHiddenAssets: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the value is `false` (the default), fetches exclude assets whose [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAsset/isHidden] property is `true`. If the value is `true`, fetches include all assets regardless of their hidden state.

## Limiting Fetch Results

- **fetchLimit**: The maximum number of objects to include in the fetch result.
- **includeAllBurstAssets**: A Boolean value that determines whether the fetch result includes all assets from burst photo sequences.
- **includeAssetSourceTypes**: The set of source types for which to include assets in the fetch result.
